Load the required R packages.
.
```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(sf)
library(mapview)
library(dplyr)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

Load the data.

```{r}
load(file = 'data/dattb.RData')
```

View the first five rows. 

```{r}
head(dattb)
```

Map the spatial data only. 

```{r}
mapview(dattb)
```
